holes.original_proof:
apply Set.Finite.subset (Fintype.finite (G := G))
intro g hg
simp_all [Set.mem_setOf_eq]

classical
rw [Nat.card_eq_fintype_card]
rw [← Cardinal.natCast_inj]
rw [Cardinal.natCast_inj]
have h₂₃ :
  Fintype.card {g : G | orderOf g = p} =
    ∑ d in (Finset.filter (fun d => d = p) (Nat.divisors (Fintype.card G))), (Nat.totient d) :=
  by
  have h₂₄ :
    Fintype.card {g : G | orderOf g = p} =
      ∑ d in (Finset.filter (fun d => d = p) (Nat.divisors (Fintype.card G))), (Nat.totient d) :=
    by exact?
  exact h₂₄
rw [h₂₃] <;> simp [Nat.card_eq_fintype_card]

classical
by_cases h₂₉ : p ∣ Fintype.card G
· have h₃₀ : p ∈ Nat.divisors (Fintype.card G) := by
    exact
      Nat.mem_divisors.mpr
        ⟨h₂₉,
          by
          have h₃₁ : p ≠ 0 := by
            have h₃₂ := hp.ne_zero
            exact h₃₂
          aesop⟩
  have h₃₁ : Finset.filter (fun d => d = p) (Nat.divisors (Fintype.card G)) = { p } :=
    by
    ext x
    simp [Finset.mem_filter, Finset.mem_singleton, Nat.mem_divisors] <;> (try decide) <;> (try omega) <;>
        (try aesop) <;>
      (try {aesop
        })
  rw [h₃₁]
  simp [Finset.sum_singleton, Nat.totient_prime hp] <;> (try decide) <;> (try omega) <;> (try aesop) <;>
      (try {aesop
        }) <;>
    (try {simp_all [Nat.card_eq_fintype_card] <;> aesop
      })
· have h₃₀ : Finset.filter (fun d => d = p) (Nat.divisors (Fintype.card G)) = ∅ :=
    by
    ext x
    simp [Finset.mem_filter, Finset.mem_singleton, Nat.mem_divisors] <;> (try decide) <;> (try omega) <;>
        (try aesop) <;>
      (try {aesop
        })
  rw [h₃₀]
  simp [Finset.sum_empty] <;> (try decide) <;> (try omega) <;> (try aesop) <;>
      (try {aesop
        }) <;>
    (try {simp_all [Nat.card_eq_fintype_card] <;> aesop
      })

exact
  Nat.mem_divisors.mpr
    ⟨h₂₉,
      by
      have h₃₁ : p ≠ 0 := by
        have h₃₂ := hp.ne_zero
        exact h₃₂
      aesop⟩

ext x
simp [Finset.mem_filter, Finset.mem_singleton, Nat.mem_divisors]
try decide
try omega
try aesop
try {aesop
}

ext x
simp [Finset.mem_filter, Finset.mem_singleton, Nat.mem_divisors]
try decide
try omega
try aesop
